siteMetadata.name: Rajeshwar Rathi
siteMetadata.title: Rajeshwar Rathi | Machine Learning Researcher and Engineer
siteMetadata.description:
A full-time Machine Learning Engineer at Bitwise and 
    part-time Data Science grad student at LJMU, UK with research interests 
    in computer vision, convolutional nets, vision transformers, generative models, attention 
    models and exploring neuroscience based Machine Learning.
siteMetadata.about:
I graduated from the College of Engineering, Pune, majoring in 
    Computer Science and Engineering in 2020. During my undergrad, 
    I did two internships, one at VInventTech for two months and built the project for automatically detecting
    helmets for two-wheelers. After that, I interned at Veritas under
    Mr Hrishikesh Date, where we worked on creating an innovative solution
    for finding dependencies between microservices.  This utility also calculated the weightage of a microservice in the system. 
    After graduation, I am working at Bitwise for multiple clients. 
    I have two years of experience in data engineering
    for two of the clients and currently working as an ML engineer for the
    payment technology firm, a client of Bitwise. As my interests inclined
    toward Machine Learning, I enrolled on an online M. Sc Data Science
    course at Liverpool John Moores University, UK, where I am currently working on my 
    Thesis (in the domain of computer vision) under the supervision of Mr Bharat Kumar Bholla.
siteMetadata.author: @rajeshwar_rathi

projects.name: Unpaired Image Translation for Brain MRI (T1 to T2 and vice-versa) using CycleGAN
projects.description: Developed a deep learning model for creating Brain MRI of type T1 from type T2 and vice versa using CycleGAN fused with ResNet blocks to reduce the cost, time and efforts while taking two types of MRI.

projects.name: HuggingFace space for generating specific handwritten digits using Conditional GAN
projects.description: Created a HuggingFace space for generating the number of hand-written digit samples for specified digit between 0 and 9 to showcase the use of Conditional GAN.

projects.name: Impact Analysis Engine for Microservices
projects.description: Developed and deployed an utility to generate the dependency graphs for Microservices using config files and log files to reduce the latency for component automation. This tool calculates the impact score of a microservice on architecture if that microservice is down depending on the weightage of microservice and bug severity.
projects.technology: Python NetworkX GraphViz regex Plotly Pandas Jenkins CI/CD

projects.name: Helmet Detection for Realtime Road Transport Video
projects.description: Built an API for detecting if a two wheeler user is wearing helmet while transporting using R-CNN with an AUC score of appromixately 85% to assure the safety of people and help maintain law

projects.name: Trading System
projects.description: Developed a mock stock trading platform with team, where I contributed for exchange connectivity between frontend and backend using REST API methods

projects.name: Terminal based Text Editor
projects.description: Developed a terminal based text-editor with functionalities like find, search and replace, delete line, save file, etc.
